text: Epsom is an electorate of the New Zealand House of Representatives. It is in Auckland. By size, Epsom is the smallest electorate in New Zealand, covering just 20kmÂ² (8 sq mi). However, it is also the richest electorate, with a median household income of NZD$118,300. It is also a conservative electorate, having only ever been held by either the National Party or the ACT Party. ==Election results== ==References== Category:New Zealand electorates
title: Epsom (New Zealand electorate)
